price: di dalamnya mereka duduk bertelakan di atas dipan, mereka tidak merasakan di dalamnya (teriknya) matahari dan tidak pula dingin yang bersangatan.
arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā ʿalā al-arāiki lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīran
